text: Machine learning can help businesses
better predict outcomes,
which can enable them to exceed expectations
and provide better experiences
for their employees and customers.
Make better business decisions
with Amazon SageMaker Canvas,
a service that helps you generate
accurate machine learning predictions
without requiring ML experience
or the need to write a single line of code.
Use the UI to create predictions for an array of use cases,
including predicting customer churn,
planning inventory efficiently, and more.
By leveraging SageMaker Canvas,
you can access ready-to-use models
or build your own ML models
to extract information and generate predictions
using data from thousands of documents,
images, and lines of text in minutes.
Import disparate cloud and on-premises data sources
so you can analyze, explore, and visualize
the relationship between features
or create new features using SageMaker Canvas's
built-in data preparation functions and operators.
Then you can share, review, and update ML models
across tools and teams to boost collaboration.
Take your company to the next level
with Amazon SageMaker Canvas.
